assetProfile.address2: No.17, Software Road Gaotang Software Industry Base Tianhe District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Bingo Software Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, and sale of cloud computing products in China. It offers BingoCloudOS, an infrastructure cloud platform solution; BingoFuse, a cloud application support platform; BingoLink, a listener enterprise collaboration platform; BingoInsight, a data lake management platform; and BingoCMP, an enterprise-level ITaaS capability platform. The company also provides human resource, logistics supply chain, engineering project, and contract management systems; mobile office platform; business operation information solutions; information communication technology solutions; planning consulting, management process combing, architecture design, technology selection and product customization development, and system integration services for operation and maintenance of rail transit industry; solutions for e-government cloud construction; and automotive industry solution, which include information solutions for the field of automotive research and development process verification. It serves government, telecommunications, public security, finance, education, information service, and other industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Weiwen  Li
companyOfficers.title: Deputy Mang. of Big Data Department of Cloud Product Center
